data.actual_result: "Display" text is grey making it very hard to read
data.expected_result: "Display" text is white so that is it completely visible
data.short_description: Connections panels "Display" text is grey on Light Theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Light Theme if not already using - Open your User Settings and go into your Connections - Link something if you don't already have anything - Observe the "Display" text in the panel of your linked connection (most noticeable with Twitch)
